reviews.review:
Portal. 
Simplesmente perfeito, consegue ser incrível mesmo hoje (2019). Foi e continua sendo um marco na história dos jogos,  uma obra de arte da Valve. 
Mais do que recomendado, é praticamente obrigatório para todos os gamers. 

PS: The cake is a lie.

Bueno, no soy muy de shooters pero esto es algo diferente y lo he visto tan barato que no me he podido resistir. 
- Es justo lo que esperaba.
- Imprescindible en tu biblioteca.
- Es corto, pero mantiene enganchado, hace pensar y divierte.
- Píllalo en las ofertas, merece la pena.
- GLaDOS p**ta ama.

Edito: Si quieres completar todos los logros sí tienes una buena duración de juego... y una buena jaqueca xD

fun game to beat

tam bir bulmaca oyunu hikayeyi de buna uydurmuşlar,yani hikayeden çok bulmaca yönüyle öne çıkıyor .Bulmaca oyunlarını seven birisiyseniz kaçırmayın derim.

Обожаю обе части "Порталов".
Хочу высказать личное мнение, что многие тут пишут, что вторая часть "вкуснее" - они правы. Но первая часть "вкусная" по-своему. 
Ох уж этот хитрый ход - светлые уровни, милые кубики, милая песенка в конце, но при этом ты чувствуешь одиночество и непонятный ком в горле.
P.S. Друга сплавил, так ещё и торт не дали:(
Amazing for its time and made the base for a shockingly good sequel. Portal was the tools to something that would become far deeper with its black tipped story line and intelligent thinking.

Juegazo. 100% recomendado.
PD: aún sigo viva.
HARİKA OYUN

I just finished my first playthrough of Portal.  Played it with only the knowledge that there is a portal gun, puzzles, and having seen a few screenshots.  Super late to the party, I know.

That being said, I had so much damn fun with this game.  Portal mechanics were interesting, the puzzles were generally simple though I had a few head scratching moments.  Can't recommend this enough, I fully understand why people like it so much.  Looking forward to playing Portal 2 after I go through the bonus maps.

Also, the ending was priceless.

A couple of details for those few newcomers like myself:  Graphics hold up reasonably well, I dug the look of Aperture Labs.  Ran mostly solid around 220-250ish fps on a 2060 with a couple of random drops into the high 70's for unknown reasons.  My only complaint is the lack of crouch toggle.  Given the length, I don't think this is worth more then about 10 dollars.  I picked up Portal 1 and 2 for less than $2 total.  That is a deal worth taking for any who haven't had the well worth your time experience of Portal.

Что сказать... Хорошая игрушка. Если уж вообще играть, то сначала проходить первую часть, только потом вторую. Но не наоборот. Потому что вторая "вкуснее", там и голоса роботов приятнее ;)
Есть довольно тяжелые задания, над которыми лично я думала долго. Единственное, что для меня показалось нудным, это глава "Побег". Долго-долго тянущаяся. даже начало появляться некое раздражение)
А в целом, игра достойна уважения)

[h1]Portal[/h1]

Honestly, this game is an absolute masterpiece. Its short, well-thought story keeps you entertained throughout the game and the revolutionary gameplay mechanic, the Portal Gun adds an element that you haven't seen before. The fact that this game was made back in 2008 shows how ahead of its time it was. Buy it, you literally will be missing out if you don't and it's cheaper than dirt.
Its really telling when a free game that comes with the orange box becomes one of the defining games on its generation. A must have.

解谜游戏（×
恐怖游戏（✔
Portal is one of The Very Best Gamest I've ever played. Difficulty rises progressively, story gets more and more interesting. Sequel is equally good, check that one too.
I like this puzzle game!

Portal reste un must-play en 2019. Surtout si vous voulez jouer au 2. Le jeu est très court (3h pour l'histoire principale en moyenne) et a certes vieilli graphiquement mais les énigmes restent prenantes bien que pas très compliquées et l'histoire très sympa. Il se trouve en promotion ou sur d'autres sites à moins d'1€, alors si vous aimez les jeu d'énigmes, les FPS et les histoires prenantes, foncez.

When I first picked it up, I was unsure if I would like it or not. However, to my great surprise, I was so in love with the whole game that I finished it in one sitting. I would recommend this to anyone.

過去のゲーム実況で評判が良かったので購入してみた。
（セールで６０円だったし）

プレイ５分で気持ち悪くなって吐いた。

良く分からんけど、画面酔いがやばいし、頭痛が酷い。

画面酔いを我慢し、一応ノーマルはクリア。

エンディングのBGMはとても良かった。

難易度＝操作性の悪さ＋画面酔い　なのでゲームとしてはどうかと思う。

定価の６００円の価格もゲームで評価せず、
音源、ＢＧＭのみでの評価ならお勧め。

Short but incredible. Portal 2 is a better game, hands down, but if you have never played this game I REALLY recommend picking up up. It's worth buying at full price, and during a sale it will be 99 cents. Thats an unbeatable price. Buy it.

Z czystym sercem mogę stwierdzić, że Portal jest wspaniałą grą. Pomimo, że gdy pierwszy raz próbowałam ją przejść nie dałam rady spróbowałam ukończyć produkcję po raz drugi - wciągnęła mnie do tego stopnia, że przeszłam ją w jeden wieczór. Dla osób uwielbiających zagadki serdecznie polecam to dzieło. W mojej opinii 10/10.

好评好评，玩过2才入手的这部。解密难度适中，剧情跌宕起伏很有代入感，结尾的歌很不错（叫still alive）。
总的来说流程较短，三小时左右通关的。
嗯，就这么多，3块钱买不了吃亏买不了上当~

可以看到07年的起源引擎已经是开发的很成熟了，直到csgo展现的淋漓尽致。非常棒的一款游戏，剧情非常好评！有时需要一些操作，略有烧脑，不过不是很难，大概3小时你就能通关主线关卡。
很难想象07年居然有这么惊艳的游戏，现在12年过去了，依旧有趣的不行，非常推介大家去尝试一番。（G胖很好，我打折12块1和2一起买的）

Best game of all time. It's society's game. You play easy to play puzzles with a story that slowly unfolds until it hits you all at once. It's a freight train of emotion and brainwork, and I would stay with this if I could only have one game to play forever.

*Edit: I wouldn't stay with this game if I could only have one, but I would definitely have it in the final pile of games that I would spend weeks making the decision on, long after the hypothetical had stopped being relevant.

An oldie, but a goodie. Portal was released on the Orange Box along side Team Fortress 2 and Half Life 2, being a pleasant surprise to me back when I had a PS3 and initially played then when I was young. While incredibly short, its brevity certainly makes the game not feel drawn out or tiring, as well as delivering cleaver foreshadowing by the robotic controller of the Aperture Science facility, GLaDOS. Fun, mind-bendy yet not mind-knotting, and written hilariously, my only complaint is how dated it has gotten since its release.

 10/10, amazing yet a tad dated.

Remember when the platform was sliding into the fire pit and I said "Goodbye", and you were like, [deep voice] "No way!" And then I was all, "We pretended we were going to murder you."? That was great.

Ein sehr gutes Spiel, das auf unterhaltsame Art und Weise das logische Denken des Spielers herausfordert und mit einer gelungenen Story verknüpft ist. Aus der recht simplen Methode des Portalschießens wurde durch kreative Ideen eine komplexe Spielweise und eine wirklich einzigartige Atmosphäre geschaffen. Vielleicht könnte die Story dem Ein oder Anderen ein wenig zu kurz sein, trotzdem finde ich das Spiel absolut empfehlenswert! Ich würde es jederzeit wieder kaufen und würde es jedem nahe legen, es zu spielen.
В этой игре есть реиграбельность , сюжет и хорошая рисовка мне все понравилось !

Lo avevo da tempo in Libreria, preso durante i saldi insieme al successore, oggi ho deciso di scaricarlo e giocarlo, nonostante lo conoscessi già per sentito dire e qualche partita fatta in Coop su Xbox, volevo provarlo per bene.

Inutile dilungarsi troppo il gioco è un MUST per il mondo videoludico, da giocare per forza, la durata della Campagna dura circa 3/4 ore, si allunga se si vogliono fare un pò di sfide Extra, che ho già iniziato a fare, ma che poi porterò a termine.

Che dire

PRO:
Trama spettacolare divertente e profonda.
Gameplay molto bello e dinamico.

Nonostante non sia un giocatore di Puzzle Game,tutto sommato non risulta molto complesso e godibile nel pieno

Ma penso che il colpo di classe, sia nel titoli di coda, ragazzi finite il gioco che meritano davvero tantissimo.

CONTRO:
Durata molto breve

Un altro aspetto fondamentale che è davvero rilassante, lo si gioca in tranquillità ed è davvero piacevole ingegnarsi per risolvere i vari livelli.


Che dire compratelo in saldi che merita davvero tanto.

神ゲーとは聞いてましたが、実際神ゲーでした。

二色のワープホールを使い分けて空間を行き来するゲームですが、12年前のものとは思えないほど面白く、新鮮です。
後半は若干助長気味な感もありますが、前半のワクワク感と後半ミステリー調なシナリオも最高。
ナレーター？とか軍用アンドロイドとかも独特な雰囲気を演出してますね。
そこそこ死にゲーの要素もありますが、オートセーブで少し前に戻されるのも有難かったです。

ただ難点が無いわけでもありません。ワープゾーンを通り抜けると、視点が重力通りの方向に戻りますので、両方とも地面に設置したりするとぐるんぐるん回転しだします。これが三半規管にダイレクトアタックなんですねぇ。他にも狭い所をしゃがんでる時も苦しかったです。そのお陰かクリア後の爽快感みたいなのが、「あーやっと3D酔いから解放される～」といった感情に上書きされてしまったのは残念でした。
おそらくストーリークリア後にプレイすることを想定しているであろうボーナスマップは、それまでのパズルメインのステージからパズル+アクション要素を必要としてきます。エイムや反射神経を要求してきますのでパズルとしては微妙かなと思います。
他にもカメラを破壊する実績がありますが、1面から連続したセーブデータでなければカウントされないようで、攻略サイトを見て「この面にはカメラがないからステージセレクトでスキップしよ」みたいなことはできなくなっています。

やはり相当昔のゲームなので若干洗練されていないイメージはありますが、それを差し引いてもプレイする価値のあるゲームだと思います。

This game is good. Not as good as Portal 2 but still good. The graphics are ok, but they work. Sure the puzzles are simplistic compared to Portal 2, but they can stump you. The boss is super fun at the end, I’d say better than Portal 2. The challenge in this game is advanced maps and challenges. The advanced maps make you use your brain and reflexes more. The challenges just make you focus on time, how many times you've used your portal gun, and how many steps you take. Great game, buy it as soon as you can. You won’t regret it!

★★★★★ ★★★★★ (10/10) - SIN SPOILERS -

Pero de vez en cuando, aparece un juego que es tan bueno que TODO NAVEGANTE DE ESTA PLATAFORMA debería jugarlo, incluso si no les gustan los juegos de ese género. Portal es uno de esos juegos.

Portal es un juego de rompecabezas en primera persona. Fue un gran juego cuando salió, es un gran juego incluso ahora. Incluso si no juegas juegos de rompecabezas, deberías intentarlo. Los rompecabezas no son demasiado difíciles. El juego introduce lentamente a un nuevo mecánico para que sea realmente fácil de entender. ¡Y resolver los puzzles es muy satisfactorio!

Tiene una historia que podría ser más profunda, solo esperare a que VALVE al fin se decida en continuar esta pequeña franquicia.
